bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Ethernet
Corrigendum 1: Multi-lane Timestamping
IEEE Standard for Ethernet - Corrigendum 1: Multi-lane Timestamping
bibdata.docidentifier: Corrigendum to IEEE Std 802.3-2015 as amended by IEEE Std 802.3bw-2015, IEEE Std 802.3by-2016, IEEE Std 802.3bq-2016, IEEE Std 802.3bp-2016, IEEE Std 802.3br-2016, IEEE Std 802.3bn-2016, IEEE Std 802.3bz-2016, IEEE Std 802.3bu-2016, IEEE Std 802.3bv-2017

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This corrigendum to IEEE Std 802.3-2015 clarifies which lane of the media dependent interface (MDI) of a multi-lane Physical Layer entity (PHY) is used as the timestamping reference point.
This corrigendum to IEEE Std 802.3-2015 clarifies which lane of the media dependent interface (MDI) of a multi-lane Physical Layer entity (PHY) is used as the timestamping reference point.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
